title: Veiled Secrets of the Library
story: The mist clings to the castle's old stones, yet within the Library's hallowed halls, forgotten whispers seem to stir, beckoning the brave.
effect: During this Day phase, Memory Searches performed in the Library succeed on a D6 roll of 5-6. However, after each Memory Search attempt in the Library, the hero must roll a D6: on a result of 1-2, they lose 1 Sanity.
